comments.raw_text:
Installing apps with the extension pops up a notification window. 

The notification window is associated with the root window, not necessarily the tab you are working in. 

So if you ever create a new window, and click on install.  The notification window will show up not in your current view, but inside a separate view which could be anywhere.

comments.text:
Repro:

1) Ctrl + N ( create new window)
2) Go to apps.mozillalabs.com
3) Click to install an app
4) Click back to first window
5) Notification will become visible and say "Do you want to install #####"
comments.creator: onecyrenus@gmail.com
